ModMetaData.name: Drop Nothing When Settling
ModMetaData.author: Heather Athebyne
ModMetaData.description:
Ever wanted to explode like a pinata to celebrate settling on a new tile, after fleeing the burning ruins of your old life? Me neither. This tiny mod simply makes it so that any time your caravan would drop everything when entering a new tile, all pawns and animals will hold on to their inventory instead.
This mod is safe to add or remove at any time.
Image by CDD20 via Pixabay.
Source is available on [url=https://github.com/heatherathebyne/dropnothingwhensettling-rimworld]GitHub[/url].
